title: Software Developer
description: We are looking for a skilled Software Developer to join our team in Kingston. The ideal candidate will have experience with JavaScript, React, and Node.js. Knowledge of database systems like PostgreSQL is a plus. Must be able to work in an agile environment and collaborate with cross-functional teams.

title: Customer Service Representative
description: Customer service position for a growing BPO in Montego Bay. Must have excellent communication skills, both written and verbal. Experience with call center software and customer relationship management tools is preferred. Knowledge of Jamaican culture and Patois is an advantage.

title: Hotel Front Desk Manager
description: Luxury resort in Ocho Rios seeking an experienced Front Desk Manager. Responsibilities include managing the front desk team, ensuring guest satisfaction, and handling reservations. Degree in Hospitality Management and 3+ years of experience in a similar role required. Must have excellent leadership and problem-solving skills.

title: Agricultural Technician
description: Looking for an Agricultural Technician to support our farming operations in St Elizabeth. Responsibilities include monitoring crop health, implementing pest control measures, and assisting with harvest. Knowledge of sustainable farming practices and experience with tropical crops is required.

title: Digital Marketing Specialist
description: Creative agency seeking a Digital Marketing Specialist with experience in social media management, content creation, and SEO. Knowledge of the Jamaican market and cultural trends is essential. Skills in graphic design and video editing are a plus.
